definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf.  [[לאׁ־יֶחֱרַף לְבָבִי מִיׇּמָָי]] Job 27:6; Pt. sf. [[חׂרְפִי]] Ps 119:42, Pr 27:11; [[חוֹרְפֶיךָ]] Ps 69:10.

definitions.title: Piel.
definitions.body: Pf. [[חֵרֵף]] Ju Jdg 5:18 + 6 t.; [[חֵרַפְתָּ]] Is 37:23 + 4 t. etc. + 10 t. pf.; Impf. [[יְחָרֵף]] 2Sa 21:21, 1Ch 20:7; [[יְחָ֫רֶף]] Ps 74:10 + 2 t. sf.; Inf. [[לְחָרֵף]] Is 37:4 + 5 t.; [[בְּחָֽרְפָם]] 2Sa 23:9 (but v. infr.); Pt. [[מְחָרֵף]] Ps 44:17; —reproach,—prop. say sharp things against,—taunt, c. acc. Ju Jdg 8:15, 1Sa 17:10, 1Sa 17:25, 1Sa 17:26, 1Sa 17:36, 1Sa 17:45, 2Sa 21:21 +1Ch 20:7; God, by injustice to the poor Pr 14:31, Pr 17:5; Yahweh, by idolatry Is 65:7; Yahweh as the God of Israel 2Ki 19:4, 2Ki 19:16, 2Ki 19:22, 2Ki 19:23 = Is 37:4, Is 37:17, Is 37:23, Is 37:24 = 2Ch 32:17 (c. [[לְ]]); c. [[בְּ]], Philistines 2Sa 23:9 MT (but rd. [[בְּפַס דַּמִּים]] at Pas-dammîm, n.pr.loc., as 1Ch 11:12 We Dr); reproach, Ne 6:13, Psalm Ps 42:11, Ps 44:17, Ps 55:13, Ps 57:4, Ps 74:10, Ps 74:18, Ps 79:12, Ps 89:52, Ps 89:52, Ps 102:9, Zep 2:8, Zep 2:10; poet. and fig., despise, scorn, [[נפשׁ למוּת]] ´[[ח]] Ju Jdg 5:18.
